title: Coinbase urges Treasury to keep GENIUS Act rules aligned with congressional intent
contentSnippet: The crypto exchange said the Treasury should ensure that non-financial software is not captured by its requirements.

title: DOGE Holds $0.16 Support as Profit-Taking Caps Breakout Attempt
contentSnippet: The token defended its ascending channel structure despite distribution pressure at the upper boundary, keeping short-term bias neutral-to-bullish above $0.16.

title: XRP Gains 5% After RLUSD Mastercard Pilot, Technical Breakout Targets $2.50
contentSnippet: The move marked the token’s strongest daily gain in a week and outperformance against a declining broader market, with traders now eyeing a clean push toward $2.50.

title: Circle Updates Terms of Service to Allow ‘Legal’ Firearm Purchases With USDC
contentSnippet: The USDC policy reversal on firearm purchases suggests that “stablecoins are at the whims of politicians,” an industry expert told Decrypt.

title: Trump Says He Wants U.S. To Be ‘The Bitcoin Superpower,’ Cites Competition From China
contentSnippet: At Miami’s America Business Forum, he said his orders ended a “war on crypto,” mentioned that crypto helps the dollar and warned China could gain if Washington stumbles.

title: Bitcoin’s Relief Rally Lifts Spirits: Is it Time to Buy the Dip?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s rebound above $100,000 has revived hopes of a recovery, but analysts warn the bounce may be more technical than fundamental.

title: UK to unveil stablecoin regulation consultation on Nov. 10 to keep pace with US: report
contentSnippet: The proposals are expected to include temporary caps on stablecoin holdings for both individuals and businesses.

title: Appeals Court Rejects Prisoner's Lawsuit Over Alleged $354M Bitcoin Loss
contentSnippet: The court said the man had waited too long to reclaim his Bitcoin fortune, which he says was on a now-destroyed hard drive.

title: How Deep Are Bitcoin Traders Hedging After Recent Price Dip Below $100K?
contentSnippet: BTC recently fell below $100,000 as macro uncertainties weighed over spot ETF inflows.

title: You Could’ve Made a 100x Prediction Market Bet on Last Night’s Elections
contentSnippet: A Polymarket wager on the margin of Mikie Sherrill’s victory in the New Jersey governor’s race severely undervalued the correct outcome.

title: European Session Buying Lifts Bitcoin Cash to $491.80 After Breaking $487 Resistance
contentSnippet: European session buying lifted volume 78% above the 24-hour average as bitcoin cash set higher lows at $462.67, $474.27 and $479.03.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum ETFs Shed $2.6 Billion in Assets Over the Past Week
contentSnippet: Bearish investors cashing out of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs has helped depress crypto market prices. One analyst told Decrypt it was nothing to worry about.

title: Robinhood’s Q3 trading revenue jumps 129% YoY, ‘primarily driven by cryptocurrency revenue’
contentSnippet: Robinhood's crypto revenue was up over 300% in Q3 to $268 million, helping to drive higher overall revenues of $1.27 billion.

title: U.S. Government Shutdown Stretches to Record 36 Days, Continues Risk of Derailing Crypto Bill
contentSnippet: Market structure legislation could still see movement this year, but likely won't become law before 2026.

title: Robinhood Q3 Earnings Top Analysts' Expectations as Crypto Revenue Surges Over 300%
contentSnippet: Despite dipping the past five days, the company's share price has risen roughly 260% year-to-date.

title: Robinhood’s Crypto Trading Revenue Soared 339% in Q3 as Company Tops Street Earnings Estimates
contentSnippet: The brokerage platform saw a record $80B in crypto trading volume; shares dipped in after hours action despite the earnings beat.

title: Franklin Templeton debuts Hong Kong’s first tokenized fund under new AI-driven fintech plan
contentSnippet: The project expands Hong Kong’s ongoing trials linking tokenized deposits, money-market funds, and potential CBDC settlement.

title: Google Maps Becomes Gemini’s Proving Ground for Real-World AI
contentSnippet: Gemini turns Google Maps into a conversational copilot with smarter navigation and real-world awareness, thanks to generative AI.

title: Labubus and Unicorns: Florida Crypto Confab Unshaken by Bitcoin Volatility
contentSnippet: Some were there to party. Others were focused on business.

title: Bitcoin Bounces Back: Can Bullish Momentum Hold or Has the Market Topped?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is bouncing, but only slightly, after falling to its lowest price in months. Is the bull run over or will traders defy historical trends?

title: Citi and DTCC Say Tokenized Collateral Works and Now Regulators Must Keep Pace
contentSnippet: As financial giants test cross-asset collateral, they say legal gaps — not tech — are the biggest threat to scale.

title: Canada Begins March Toward Stablecoin Regulations
contentSnippet: In the wake of the U.S. GENIUS Act, Canadian lawmakers are moving on Canadian-dollar-backed stablecoin legislation, which is being cheered by crypto interests.

title: Monad Reveals Mainnet and Token Launch Date Following Airdrop Claim
contentSnippet: Following its airdrop claim, the Monad Foundation said it launch the mainnet of its layer-1 network later this month alongside the MON token.

title: Mastercard, Ripple and Gemini explore settling card transactions using XRPL
contentSnippet: Crypto platforms are hoping to generate more transaction revenue and add new clients by offering debit and credit cards.

title: The Protocol: ZKSync Aims to Revamp Its Tokenomics Model
contentSnippet: Also: The First AI Agent App Store, ETH Devs Lock In Fusaka Mainnet Date and Edge & Node’s Ampersand.

title: The Daily: Monad sets mainnet and airdrop for Nov. 24, Ripple raises $500M, Bitcoin’s ‘IPO moment,’ and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Galaxy trims bitcoin year-end target to $120,000 amid whale selling, AI competition and gold demand
contentSnippet: Galaxy Digital says bitcoin’s “maturity era” has slowed upside momentum as whales offload and ETFs absorb supply.

title: CMT Digital raises $136 million for fourth crypto VC fund, ‘turned investors away’
contentSnippet: The Chicago-based offshoot of CMT Group began raising capital for its fourth crypto fund in mid-2024, targeting $150 million.

title: Metaplanet borrows $100 million against its bitcoin holdings to buy the dip
contentSnippet: The company’s bitcoin mNAV ratio has recovered slightly after dipping below parity last month, but shares remain down more than 80%.

title: Chainlink and Dinari bringing S&P crypto stock index onchain
contentSnippet: Chainlink said Monday it also partnered with FTSE Russell to bring its indices and market data onchain.
